mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.FILE_PATH as filePath, a.FILE_NAME as fileName, a.FILE_IDENTIFICATION as fileIdentification, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_FILE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , FILE_PATH , FILE_NAME , FILE_IDENTIFICATION , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{filePath} , #{fileName} , #{fileIdentification} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_FILE SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_FILE
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
FILE_PATH ,
FILE_NAME ,
FILE_IDENTIFICATION ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{filePath} ,
#{fileName} ,
#{fileIdentification} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,
#{updatedDate}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_FILE
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
FILE_PATH = #{filePath} ,
FILE_NAME = #{fileName} ,
FILE_IDENTIFICATION = #{fileIdentification} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_FILE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , FILE_PATH , FILE_NAME , FILE_IDENTIFICATION , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.filePath} , #{item.fileName} , #{item.fileIdentification} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_FILE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , FILE_PATH = #{item.filePath} , FILE_NAME = #{item.fileName} , FILE_IDENTIFICATION = #{item.fileIdentification} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_FILE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , FILE_PATH = #{filePath} , FILE_NAME = #{fileName} , FILE_IDENTIFICATION = #{fileIdentification} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PER_FILE a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_PER_FILE a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
